text: Nagra afete zage hanati kazigati mago vahera ke hu'noankino, agra mago tumpa namamo mago'zaga aheno nenaku eri fafukino eramiaza huno eno, Nagrama antahintahima retro'ma hu'noa zana agra emeri fore nehuno, Nagrama tro hugahuema hu'na hu'noa zantamina agra eme tro nehuno, e'inahu eri'za erigahue hu'nama huhampari'noa zana agra emeri vagaregahie.
